alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Culberson County through 630 PM CDT/530 PM MDT/... At 547 PM CDT/447 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Pine Springs. This storm was drifting northeast. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Culberson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
